definition: young goat, tell false information to for fun
details:
noun
- young goat
- a young person of either sex
= synonyms: nestling
- a human offspring of any age
= example: a human offspring of any age
= synonyms: child
- soft smooth leather from the hide of a young goat
= example: soft smooth leather from the hide of a young goat
= synonyms: kidskin
verb
- tell false information to for fun
= synonyms: pull the leg of
- be silly or tease one another
= example: be silly or tease one another
= synonyms: jolly, chaff, banter, josh
